name: temporal-glyph-operator
description: A sophisticated research platform for fractal analysis featuring multi-viewport observation, motif convergence tracking, and evidence-based intelligence
author: Hayden Lindley

scripts.build: npm run -w packages/glyph-core build && npm run -w packages/vision-kernel build && npm run -w packages/viewport-manager build && npm run -w packages/proxy-operator build && npm run -w packages/report-engine build && npm run -w packages/adapters build && npm run -w packages/address-mapper build && npm run -w packages/glyph-drive build && npm run -w apps/viewer build
scripts.bench: npm run -w packages/adapters bench && npm run -w packages/address-mapper bench && npm run -w packages/glyph-drive bench
